channel.title: Need help with shops
channel.description: Hey i just recently figured out how to add shops and everything and i did that the only problem is the fact that i dont know how to set prices for the items in my shop. I wanna do this cause its a custom item and rare store so i dont want it selling for 350gp... Thanks if you help :)

item.title: Need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @tehlobbiescape tehlobbiescape
item.description:
@tehlobbiescape wrote:

[quote=“r8edhardknock03, post:2, topic:271988”]go on to your server and go on to item cfg.
a whole bunch of items shuld come up eg.
item = 1 Tool_kit These_could_be_handy. 1 1 1
the three 1’s is the price for the item[/quote] Thats right! the first “1” is low alch the next “1” is high alch (may be other way around) and last “1” is store price

Read full topic
